frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-top-bar-organizer
frozen.shortDescription: Organize the items of the top (menu)bar.
frozen.longDescription:
Organize the items of the top (menu)bar.
This extension required Gnome Shell version 40.
Organize the items by going into the extensions settings.

!!! Please make sure you're fully on Gnome 40 / you're using a distribution, which is fully on Gnome 40, since otherwise this extension might not work correctly. This was the case for Manjaro Stable until recently and is probably the case for Ubuntu 21.04 right now. !!!
